<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the text associated with a location. This text will be displayed on the game map at the location's position. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> location '''setText''' text </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLocation [[setText]] "Rahmadi Village"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[text]], [[createLocation]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
